function.name: dryingTime_increase
function.description: This function is used to increase the operating time of the dryer.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to increase the drying time.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment to increase the drying time.

dryingTimer.description: The amount of time in minutes to increase the drying timer.
